title: Trump Holds Rally Amid Aftermath of Family Separation Policy: A Closer Look | Sen. Tammy Baldwin
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump retreating to the safe space of a campaign rally as the aftermath of his family separation policy came to light.

Then, Senator Tammy Baldwin talks about fighting outside interests in her reelection campaign and being the first openly gay senator elected to the United States Senate.

She also takes a few more questions backstage from Late Night producer Kevin Miller.
